item.title: Qorvo Inc 10-K
item.description: Qorvo Inc, which is in the Semiconductors & Related Devices [3674] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 24, 2021 had 30168 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 334 instances million - 317 instances 2021 - 263 instances financial - 236 instances fiscal - 224 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
